# README: Keep in sync with pyproject.toml

black
flake8
isort
mypy
pytest
pytest-cov
pytest-xdist
pytest-benchmark

matplotlib
numpy
scikit-learn

textblob
pandas
pylatexenc

# Testing framework/infra
websocket-client
requests

jupyter
